Quote: Our relationship wasn't the sun, the moon, the stars, but it wasn't bullshit, either.
Author: Junot Díaz,  This Is How You Lose Her

Quote: Thrilled with the knowledge that she loved me, it took me a moment to realize that she was angry. I found her tantrum irresistible."#Ren
Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse

Quote: Okay, then I’ll just say I love you. There is nothing in this world more important to me than you are. I’m only content when you’re near. My whole purpose is to be what you need me to be. It’s not poetry, but it’s from my heart. Will that do?
Author: Colleen Houck

Quote: If you find yourself thirsting for my love, don’t forget that I sell straws in a variety of flavors. What is the price of romance? Good question. Today only it’s on sale for half-off wholesale prices. Everything must go. My entire inventory of straws is being liquidated.
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: Either I will love you, or I will love you if and only if you love me in return. I prefer the former.
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: White letters plus white paper equals invisibility. Just because you can’t see my love for you, doesn’t mean I didn’t write about it.
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: You are my heart as it beats within my chest, my soul as it moves through my mind. The breath in my body that so fascinates you is your essence pouring in and out of me in a wave that drowns me over and over again until I cannot breathe for wanting you. Needing you.
Author: Jacquelyn Frank,  Elijah

Quote: It was heartfelt, it was heartbreaking. It was extreme joy, it was bone-crushing grief. It was fiery hot, it was icy-cold. It was true love sprouting... it was true love dying.It's like we were both trying to hold onto something that was slipping through our fingers, and we didn't understand why.
Author: S.C. Stephens,  Thoughtless

Quote: I feel…and I have reason to believe…that we could come to mean something to each other.
Author: Colleen Houck

Quote: This desire to govern a woman -- it lies very deep, and men and women must fight it together.... But I do love you surely in a better way then he does."He thought. "Yes -- really in a better way. I want you to have your own thoughts even when I hold you in my arms.
Author: E.M. Forster,  A Room with a View

Quote: because being with you makes perfect sense
Author: Tim McGraw

Quote: If I looked like him,” Tara said. “I’d want to have sex with myself. All the time.
Author: Jill Shalvis,  Simply Irresistible

Quote: Laugh as much as you breathe and love as long as you live.
Author: Sherrilyn Kenyon,  Born of Shadows

Quote: I am so extreme that I do parkour like a caterpillar gyrates. My movements are slow and methodical, but eventually my free running takes flight. I love the same exact way, and my romance has the essence of a butterfly.
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: I can sell you wine and I can sell you flowers, but I can't sell you romance, because that comes from your heart, and it's free.
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: It was the sort of bone deep emotion that made him want to hold her tighter with one hand, and draw a sword against the world with the other.
Author: Jeaniene Frost,  First Drop of Crimson

Quote: I used to gorge on gorgeous women, but now I look for things that can’t be seen with the eyes, but are only detected by the heart. This is love.
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: You can use your mouth to speak the words I love you, or you can use your mouth to kiss me and transport love from your mind to my heart.
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: I had fallen too far. I was in love with Rush Finlay.
Author: Abbi Glines,  Fallen Too Far

Quote: This is going to sound crazy, but... from the moment I first set eyes on you I haven't been able to stop thinking about you.
Author: Leigh Fallon,  Carrier of the Mark

Quote: My coffee cup is empty. Why don't you pour your love in and wake up my soul?
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: Her love is more aww than awe, and even if were awesome, I want aweall, not merely some awe. I’m greedy for the amazing.
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: She had been forced into prudence in her youth, she learned romance as she grew older: the natural sequel of an unnatural beginning.
Author: Jane Austen,  Persuasion

Quote: Forget men, I want to marry my MacBook. It’s dependable, reliable and you can even go shopping with it.
Author: Alexandra Potter,  You're The One That I Don't Want

Quote: I love you breathlessly, my amazing man.
Author: Paullina Simons,  The Bronze Horseman

Quote: Love is a game of tic-tac-toe,constantly waitingfor the next x or o.
Author: Lang Leav

Quote: When we first met, I didn't want to get involved with anyone. I didn't have the time or energy, and I wasn't sure that I was ready for it. But you were so good to me, and I got swept up in that. And little by little, I found myself falling in love with you.
Author: Nicholas Sparks

Quote: I been watchin' you, workin day and night, slavin so hard you barely have time to catch your breath. People do that for three reasons. Either they crazy, or stupid, or tryin' to forget.
Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

Quote: The trick is finding a person whose flaws don't drive you crazy...you know...someone whose flaws you can live with...someone who can stand your flaws, too.
Author: Marcia Lynn McClure

Quote: I wrapped the unyielding woman I loved in my arms & kissed her slowly, hoping that some part of her would sense my absolute devotion."#Ren
Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse

Quote: She craved a tall glass of the fresh-squeezed lemonade from the pitcher she’d left chilling in the fridge. Two glasses served with a generous slice of pound cake with orange glaze icing sounded twice as nice.
Author: Ed Lynskey,  Fur the Win

Quote: She’d fallen into a deep silence once, when the sun appeared, and it was then he’d wondered most what she was thinking.
Author: Veronica Rossi,  Under the Never Sky

Quote: When I go off the grid, my main source of light will be fireflies. Oh, and the glow that will come from the epic love poem I am writing for you.
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: Every day I think today could be my last day. My only fear is dying without telling her I love her one more time. All I pray for is one more time.
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: Maybe sometimes we can only see the truth about ourselves if someone shows us where to look.
Author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Retribution of Mara Dyer

Quote: She answered with a passion I didn’t expect & I was lost. In that moment our hearts beat as one. In that moment I knew she loved me."#Ren
Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse

Quote: When what you want is a relationship, and not a person, get a dog.
Author: Deb Caletti,  The Secret Life of Prince Charming

Quote: She’s twelve hours in the future, and exactly half a world away. No matter how hard I try, I will always be a part of her past.
Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Quote: We looked at each other for a minute, not saying anything, but I could feel the air between us shift. It became thick, sultry, and tangible—like when the air changes right before a storm. I could feel its power envelop me as it brushed across my skin. Even though I couldn’t see it, I knew a storm was coming.
Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse

Quote: The culture of women in the church today is crippled by some very pervasive lies. "To be spiritual is to be busy. To be spiritual is to be disciplined. To be spiritual is to be dutiful."No, to be spiritual is to be in Romance with God. The desire to be romanced lies deep in the heart of every women. It is for such that you were made. Are you ARE romanced, and ever will be.
Author: John Eldredge

Quote: The world takes us to a silver screen on which flickering images of passion and romance play, and as we watch, the world says, “This is love.” God takes us to the foot of a tree on which a naked and bloodied man hangs and says, “This is love.
Author: Joshua Harris,  I Kissed Dating Goodbye: A New Attitude Toward Relationships and Romance

Quote: The most difficult aspect of moving on is accepting that the other person already did.
Author: Faraaz Kazi

Quote: A gentleman holds my hand.A man pulls my hair.A soulmate will do both.
Author: Alessandra Torre

Quote: Why is everything always my decision?"I asked.Because you will not tolerate anything else."Oh, I remembered now. "Great", I whispered.- Anita to Jean-Claude
Author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  Cerulean Sins

Quote: I’ve become skeptical of the unwritten rule that just because a boy and girl appear in the same feature, a romance must ensue. Rather, I want to portray a slightly different relationship, one where the two mutually inspire each other to live - if I’m able to, then perhaps I’ll be closer to portraying a true expression of love.
Author: Hayao Miyazaki

Quote: It was finally becoming clear to her that love wasn't about finding someone perfect to marry. Love was about seeing through to the truth of a person, and accepting all their shades of light and dark. Love was an ability.
Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Tempt Me at Twilight

Quote: Does that count as an argument? Can we kiss and make up now?”"It was only half an argument.”“Fine. Then, you kiss and I’ll make up.”I laughed until he effectively shut me up with his lips.
Author: Colleen Houck

Quote: It's time, Perry". He let her go. She took a step back, taking in his face one last time. His green eyes. The bend in his nose and the scars on his cheek. All the tiny inperfections that made him beautiful. Without a word, she turned and made her way downhill.
Author: Veronica Rossi,  Under the Never Sky

Quote: You keep runnin that mouth and I'm goin to take you back there and screw you.
Author: Cormac McCarthy,  No Country For Old Men

Quote: Why is he scared of the dark?"I meant the words for a joke, but Shade nodded seriously. "Like all monsters. Because it reminds him of what he truly is".
Author: Rosamund Hodge,  Cruel Beauty

Quote: I can't imagine a romance novel published today where the hero rapes the heroine and she falls in love with him.
Author: Julia Quinn

Quote: Wow,” said Adrian. He sat down on the bed and tested its bounciness, giving it a nod of approval. “This is amazing. What do you think, buttercup?”“I have no words,” I said honestly.He patted the spot beside him. “Want to try it out?
Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell

Quote: your handtouching mine.this is howgalaxiescollide.
Author: Sanober Khan

Quote: I’ve been working hard to become the kind of man she needs, the kind of man she already believes me to be.
Author: Colleen Houck

Quote: Star-crossed lovers desperate to get home together. Two hearts beating as one. Romance.
Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
